adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: anthropic-group-1

model.title: Model
model.description: Model name. Refer to Anthropic's documentation for the list of available models.

max_tokens.title: Maximum Output Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to limit LLM replies, the maximum possible differs from model to model.

enable_thinking.title: Enable Extended Thinking
enable_thinking.description: Enhances reasoning for complex tasks with step-by-step transparency. For more information checkout Anthropic's official [doc](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/build-with-claude/extended-thinking).

enable_extended_context.title: Enable Extended Context (1M)
enable_extended_context.description: Enables 1 million token context window. Available for Claude Sonnet 4 and Sonnet 4.5 models. Currently in beta for Usage Tier 4 organizations.

budget_tokens.title: Thinking Budget Tokens
budget_tokens.description: Sets the max tokens for Claude's internal reasoning when thinking is enabled
